00066 inline void ClassifierStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00067 {
00068     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00069 
00070     if ( classificationTime_.get() != 0 )
00071         totalTime_ += *classificationTime_.get();
00072 };

00074 inline void ClassifierStatistics::classificationTime (const double& elapsedTime)
00075 {
00076     classificationTime_.reset(new double(elapsedTime));
00077     updateTotalTime();
00078 };
